mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT expo_region AS expoRegion, region_count FROM ( SELECT expo_region, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS row_num, COUNT(*) AS region_count FROM tbl_exposure WHERE ad_idx = #{ad_idx} GROUP BY expo_region) WHERE row_num = 1) CROSS JOIN (SELECT * FROM( SELECT TO_CHAR(EXPO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, COUNT(*) AS month_count FROM TBL_EXPOSURE WHERE TO_CHAR(EXPO_DATE, 'YYYY') = '2024' AND ad_idx = #{ad_idx} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(EXPO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY month DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) CROSS JOIN (SELECT * FROM( SELECT TO_CHAR(EXPO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS day, count(*) AS day_count FROM TBL_EXPOSURE WHERE TO_CHAR(EXPO_DATE, 'YYYY') = '2024' AND ad_idx = #{ad_idx} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(EXPO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY day DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1)
